Serial No Employee No.of Leaves Approved No.of Leaves Pending No.of Leaves Rejected No.of Leaves Remaining Delete
{{leave.name}} {{leave.serial_no}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { JwtService } from '../jwt.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-emp-wise-leaves', templateUrl: './emp-wise-leaves.component.html', styleUrls: ['./emp-wise-leaves.component.scss'] }) export class EmpWiseLeavesComponent { constructor(private service:JwtService){ this.getSummary(); } leaveSummary:any = null; getSummary(){ this.service.getLeaveSummary().subscribe( (resp)=>{ console.log(resp); this.leaveSummary=resp; console.log(this.leaveSummary) }, (err)=>console.log(err) ); } }
